text:
That particular styling option is only available on dnd sections. If you’re having trouble finding it while editing a page, make sure you’re selecting a section and not a row, column, or module.

If you’re looking to add it to a module, I don’t believe that’s currently possible/supported.

Our blog search results page h1 displays apostrophes as html code. The input also changes the character into html code after page load. Our blog search results page module uses `{{ request.query_dict.term|escape }}` to get the search term. What can I do to render those characters correctly?
